001package imagingbook.lib.color;
002
003public abstract class Rgb {
004
005        public static int[] intToRgb(int p) {
006                int[] RGB = new int[3];
007                intToRgb(p, RGB);
008                return RGB;
009        }
010        
011        public static void intToRgb(int p, int[] RGB) {
012                RGB[0] = ((p >> 16) & 0xFF);
013                RGB[1] = ((p >> 8) & 0xFF);
014                RGB[2] = (p & 0xFF);
015        }
016
017        public static int rgbToInt(int red, int grn, int blu) {
018                return ((red & 0xff)<<16) | ((grn & 0xff)<<8) | blu & 0xff;
019        }
020
021}
